cleaned_text: Autism recovery and vaccine detox How prevalent is autism? Every 15 seconds a child is diagnosed with autism somewhere in the world ( [click here to see the Autism Clock:](https://www.google.com/url?q=https%3A%2F%2Fsites.google.com%2Fa%2Fhautmanhomeopathy.com%2Fwww%2Fhome%2Fgoog_1469775442&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw1kdVRABtpNQ5_qdwyRnhqz) [ the number of children diagnosed with autism since January 1, 2010).](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.autismclock.com%2Findex.html&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw2Zd4RoajzAwaG45mftOvYp) According to the [National Autistic Society](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.autism.org.uk%2Fabout-autism%2Fmyths-facts-and-statistics%2Fstatistics-how-many-people-have-autism-spectrum-disorders.aspx&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw2rwMBJZU2xS4dYkZj963J-), Autistic Spectrum Disorder (ASD) currently affects 1 in 100 children. In the UK, according to [Simon Baron-Cohen from Cambridge University](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.autismresearchcentre.com%2Fpeople_baron-cohen&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw0V-JJjGgLOKOU7dIfsSqOu), the rate may be as high as 1 in 56 children. Neither the cause of, nor a cure for ASD is clear, although as the film on the right shows, ASD is often linked to vaccine damage ( [Vaccines, Infant Deaths, Autism, and Homeopathy - What's the Connection?](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fhomeopathyplus.com.au%2Fvaccines-infant-deaths-autism-and-homeopathy-what%25E2%2580%2599s-the-connection%2F&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw1HC6I_H3DIHlYMre46xfwt)) [If you feel you or your children have been damaged by vaccines, please fill in this questionaire](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.vaccineinjury.info%2Fvaccine-damage-report.html&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw3ECZFZxVLYVKRb11IJAMyh). Whatever the rates of ASD are, the fact remains that a huge and expensive support 'industry' is needed to enable parents to cope, and [ASD has been estimated to cost the UK government about £34 Billion a year](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Feprints.lse.ac.uk%2F44030%2F&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw1URjhc9deccJLKDV0HBUnZ). Despite this, a significant proportion of a generation may never be able to live independent lives. Many parents find getting the support they need to be an uphill struggle, at best, and worry about what will happen when they can no longer look after their ASD child themselves. Please don't despair however, because homeopathy can improve many of the symptoms of ASD, and many children have recovered almost completely (see below). On this page you will find many wonderful recovery stories and information about the use of homeopathy and other therapies for autism spectrum disorders and for vaccine damage in general. "Homeopathy, without a doubt, is one of the best things to ever happen to our family." ( [Erica McPhee, www.recoveredfromautism.com](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.recoveredfromautism.com%2F&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw27AMHiBOwqLlF0ha88-Tqg)) From Within, Without The story of a mother desperately trying to save her son and a doctor passionately trying to save humanity. The journey of a boy with autism. Nancy Korn had one dream in life-to become a mother. She and her husband Evan wanted a big family. After six years of trying, they finally got pregnant and gave birth to a healthy little boy, Lucas. His development was normal. But when he approached his first birthday, Lucas began to act strangely. By age two, Lucas was diagnosed with autism. Nancy and Evan were devastated. They set out on a mission to bring their son back. Finding few answers in conventional medicine, they turned to alternative therapies. Some helped. Nothing cured. Lucas was still autistic. He still could not talk. One day, Nancy read about a doctor in Los Angeles who was using a centuries-old medical system, homeopathy, to treat autism. The physician, [Dr. Luc De Schepper](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.drluc.com%2F&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw3RRUkx06bEN9_aZOiikPHo)- affectionately known as 'Dr. Luc' -- is a medical doctor, licensed acupuncturist and homeopath, an author of 15 books, and a respected teacher and lecturer worldwide. Despite his impressive credentials, the method—and the doctor—were controversial. But Nancy had a feeling. A week later she and her mother-in-law found themselves flying across the country to meet with [Dr. Luc](http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.drluc.com%2F&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw3RRUkx06bEN9_aZOiikPHo). After starting homeopathic treatment, Lucas begins to improve. The film follows their story over the next year to see if Lucas becomes free of his autism. Saving a Lost Generation Homeopaths in clinics across the UK, the USA and Australia are quietly getting on with their work. Using a protocol of homeopathic medicine and dietary changes a significant number of families are getting their lost children back. Given the paucity of options available for these families, we owe it to this generation of children and their parents to bring this protocol to the public's attention, and to demand that the potential of this approach be thoroughly investigated by a clinical trial.
